Description_lang: Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for $d, increasing healing received by $s1%$?s159599[][ and preventing the target from dying by sacrificing itself.  This sacrifice terminates the effect and heals the target for $s2% of maximum health]. Castable while stunned.Massive damage amounts will kill the target despite this effect.
AuraDescription_lang: Increased healing received by $w1%$?$w1<100[ and will prevent 1 killing blow][].
